alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 1:58AM PST until January 17 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches below 7000 feet, 8 to 14 inches above 7000 feet, and higher amounts possible above 9000 feet. Southwest winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Spring Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could reduce visibilities. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief break in precipitation expected today, before heavy snow picks back up tonight through Monday. Accumulating snow between 8 and 14 inches is possible on State Route 156, State Route 157, and State Route 158, resulting in dangerous road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
